Name: Pina Colada Cocktail (Cuban Style)
Ingredients: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins or Pineapple shell glass .
Review: This Colada has no coconut, but it is smooth, balanced and rather tasty.
History: Basically a pineapple-flavoured Daiquiri . This recipe is based on a piece in the December 1922 edition of Travel Magazine , the first known written reference to a Piña Colada , and is what we now refer to as a 'Cuban Style Piña Colada' - one without coconut.
Nutrition: One serving of Pina Colada Cocktail (Cuban Style) contains 258 calories
